name: Sven den Hartog
education: BS Software Science - Eindhoven University of Technology
achievements: Won the fastest sorting machine competition in my first university year
shortabout: Student Artificial Inteligence and graduate Software Science. Specialized in machine learning applications for web and language interaction. Passionate programmer with a competitive personality. My hobbies include making and playing games and working on Raspberry Pi projects.
about: Hello! My name is Sven and I'm a master student Artificial Intelligence at Radboud University. In my bachelor Software Science I specialized in web technologies, AI, computer graphics and game design. I became interested in computer graphics in games and combining web technology and AI. After my bachelor I chose to continue with AI and specialize in web and language interaction, but I'm still interested in computer graphics and I regularly make games as a hobby.
